message.body: Brilliant idea. Worlds of Fun sometime. Think Grace is tall enough
I can't ride too many rides since i'm a heart patient. Will have to be a not so hot day to walk around
Crap! Forgot about that. I'll think of something else
Monsters University is the other summer movie you were thinking of. I want to see it!! June 21 is the start date just saw the commercial
Jim and i wants to see it with the kids. You can take them to see it a second time since I know they will want to see it more than once
That totally works I don't mind sloppy seconds
I had kids so I can go see kid movies without seeming weird. Lot of work just to see a few cartoons
Yeah it is. Why do you think I didn't have them - i'm too lazy!!
